channel.title: Shape Creator
channel.description:
Yo, I just felt like posting something that I use to create my 3d shapes.. its a small IDE. Just check it out, I don't think anyone cares lol but I just felt maybe to help someone out, i really dont know.
The jar doesn't work, sorry to say.. if someone knows the problem with my jar, please tell me, its most likely because my run method repeats every 50 milliseconds but i dont think that is the problem..
also, the delete point only works for the last point.. and the move point works weirdly too.. lol.
seperators work great
if you work out any glitches please tell me, I would love to see this be perfect
thank you, you can edit this and take credit for it all you want, i dont care
EDIT: Wow this is really reliable after 80 points.. its still loading and saving and all that...
pics: Menu's (all work) [IMG]http://i119.photobucket.com/albums/o158/Alex_Mirchev/thing-1.jpg[/img] Work in progress... [IMG]http://i119.photobucket.com/albums/o158/Alex_Mirchev/thing2.jpg[/img]
